programme.title: Every shot of Rory McIlroy's Final Round HDDC 2025
programme.desc: Every shot that was televised of Rory McIlroy's final round 66 at the 2025 HDDC.

programme.title: Dubai Duty Free Irish Open 2016
programme.desc: Rory McIlroy won the 2016 Irish Open at 12-under, sealing it with a clutch eagle on the final hole!

programme.title: Rory McIlroy Range Session with Top Tracer
programme.desc: Rory McIlroy range session with Top Tracer at the 2023 Genesis Scottish Open.

programme.title: DP World Tour Championship Dubai Day 4 2024
programme.desc: See McIlroy win the DP World Tour Championship at 15-under, 2 shots ahead, securing his 6th Race to Dubai title.

programme.title: BMW International Open Day 4 2025
programme.desc: Dan Brown secured an emotional two shot victory to lift the 2025 BMW International Open trophy.

programme.title: DP World Tour Championship Dubai Day 4 2021
programme.desc: Collin Morikawa won the 2021 DP World Tour Championship at 17-under, clinching the Race to Dubai title!
